name: Basketball 2D shooter Game
description:
Basketball Game2D is a pure shooting game experience that tests your overall ability in a basketball game. From your shooting accuracy, scoring ability, time management and multi-hoop skills.
Dunk the basket and swipe the ball towards the hoop to gain more points and stars.
Points and stars which can be used to unlock new balls and different game modes.
Game modes range from; Endless, time challenge, bounce, and multi-hoops.
Endless gives you unlimited time to try out new stuff.
Time management puts a restrain on your free will, allowing you to focus.
Key Features
2D graphics
Cartoon-like display
Very addictive game
